title: Gamification-Based ESP (English for Specific Purposes) Workplace English MOOC Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Enhances job-specific English proficiency for managers/leaders, integrating gamification elements with personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can accurately convey core content by over 80% when using gamification elements in job-related English presentations and report writing.
Learners can use negotiation and leadership English expressions required in work environments with over 70% fluency through simulation-based role-play activities.
Learners can collaborate with team members to develop ESP learning materials incorporating gamification elements and submit improvement plans reflecting feedback through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
